analysis.description:
MilitaryPay.fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x7288c72af505e3a6ff2712699e2a695465d353b3.sol#220-300) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= absLowTimeBonusLimit (/unique_chucks/14/0x7288c72af505e3a6ff2712699e2a695465d353b3.sol#260-271)
	- block.timestamp >= absMidTimeBonusLimit (/unique_chucks/14/0x7288c72af505e3a6ff2712699e2a695465d353b3.sol#264-271)
	- block.timestamp > preSaleStartTime && block.timestamp < preSaleEndTime (/unique_chucks/14/0x7288c72af505e3a6ff2712699e2a695465d353b3.sol#230-251)
	- block.timestamp > saleStartTime && block.timestamp < saleEndTime (/unique_chucks/14/0x7288c72af505e3a6ff2712699e2a695465d353b3.sol#237-251)
	- block.timestamp >= absHighTimeBonusLimit (/unique_chucks/14/0x7288c72af505e3a6ff2712699e2a695465d353b3.sol#268-271)
